訨字的基本解释

訨
zhǐ
诈。
揭发明人阴私。

訨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhǐ］
［《集韻》渚市切，上止，章。］
(1)揭发他人阴私。
(2)作人名用字。宋有赵孟訨。见《宋史·宗室世系表七》。

訨字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　訨； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1150第14
【集韻】渚市切，音止。訐也。　又人名。【宋史·宗室表】承節郞不訨。　又【玉篇】諸是切，音紙。義同。

訨字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
訨字的起名意思

暂无。

訨
Basic explanation of words
訨
zhǐ
Fraud.
Expose the secrets of the inventor.
訨
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhǐ］
["Ji Yun" Zhushi cut, top stop, chapter. ]
(1) Expose the privates of others.
(2) Use words for names. Song You Zhao Mengxun. See "Song History · Clan Lineage Table Seven".
訨
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　訨; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 1150 14
[Ji Yun] Zhushi cuts, the sound stops. Yeah.　Another name. 【Song History·Clan Table】Certain the festival without sorrow.　[Jade articles] All kinds of cuts, sound paper. The same meaning.
